caption.center: WILLIE JOHN BOWIE, Appellant v. THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Sixth District, Texarkana.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from the 188th Judicial District Court, Gregg County, Texas, Trial Court No. 30,624-A.

panel.unpublished: Before MORRISS, C.J., ROSS and CARTER, JJ.

opinion_byline.unpublished: Memorandum Opinion by Chief Justice JOSH R. MORRISS, III.

opinion_text.unpublished:
Willie John Bowie has filed a motion asking this Court to dismiss his appeal. Pursuant to Tex.R.App.P. 42.2, his motion is granted.
We dismiss the appeal.
